column4: when it say this "for conffile in /etc/ndiswrapper/bcmwl5/*.conf; do
sudo cat $conffile | sed -e 's/RadioState|1/RadioState|0/' > $conffile
done" i have ot type in teh whole thing?
it's all one command, yes
but i got permission denied
yea, you can try this -- sudo perl -i.bak -ple 's/RadioState\|1/RadioState\|0/' /etc/ndiswrapper/bcmwl5/*.conf
yeah
i don't know how to get it back
i think i know the problem now. with acpi=off the wireless card is nto associated with irq, so no matterwhat i do, i wont' be able to turn it on
i saw that error when i tried ndiswrapper, and i just read that in some forum
i may try their tricks to see how that works. no clue, but will try anyway :-D
you know how to disable the service cpuspeed?
it says command not found
it says there's no such file or directory
i got it to work
hey, thanks for your help last night
hmm, was that the broadcom issue?
yeah. i found the solution, so simple
cool, what was it?
acpi=off wouldn't bind ndiswrapper and its driver with irq0. i had to change boot parameter
nice, will try and remember that :)
